messages.message:
In deployment metrics, the *Configure threshold* button should be *Configure alerts*. I'm pretty sure "alert" is what we had in designs?

Threshold relates to confidence, and is unclear in this context. cc: @jack.robbins
with the current functionality, they're both a bit misleading. Alerts don't send anything outbound, like an email or webhook, its purely an icon we show on this report.

yes - it looks like the designs used 'alerts' & not thresholds, and we use 'alerts' in the modal: https://www.figma.com/design/lGeTXkPQwx43hfW9GyJOmn?node-id=1219-52540#847569606

I'll create a ticket to switch it to alerts to make them match
